span.strong: Free Access to Internet for Students/Families

div.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; text-align: center;
caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: Helvetica; font-size: 12px; text-align: center;

div.div:
For our school families that do not currently have home internet, please find information attached for a number of options to receive service. Some of these solutions might be temporary, but we are hopeful that at least one of the providers and/or hot spot locations will allow your student the ability to access the web for continuous learning.
internet provider information.pdf

p.style: letter-spacing: normal; caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-family: verdana, arial, helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: 10.800000190734863px; text-align: center;

span.style: caret-color: rgb(0, 0, 0); font-size: 12px; font-family: Helvetica; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);
span.br: Beginning March 26, Leavenworth USD 453's Child Nutrition Department will be preparing and serving FREE grab-and-go breakfast and lunch service at both Anthony Elementary and David Brewer Elementary. See the attached informational flyers for schedule of distribution, menu, and traffic/pedestrian circulation maps. Please note that per federal guidelines, meals can only be distributed to children between the ages of 1-18, and they must be physically present at pick-up to receive meal service. This service will continue with Monday thru Friday until May 22, 2020.
